definitions: in a way that shows a fondness for causing trouble in a playful way

examples.text: she met his eyes and smiled mischievously
the book, mischievously titled "Confessions of a Nun"

shortDefinitions: in way that shows fondness for causing trouble in playful way

definitions: in a way that causes or intends to cause harm or trouble

examples.text: I believe he has mischievously misled the Committee

shortDefinitions: in way that causes or intends to cause harm or trouble
